name: Z-Spike Strip
effect: Sets up Poison Spikes, Spikes and Stealth Rocks on the opponent's battlefield, which trigger every time a victim switches targets from the one they had on the previous turn. When triggered, Poison the victim and deal 3d6 dice of damage. Add or subtract 1d6 for every weakness or resistance the victim has to Rock type, respectively. Poison doesn't affect Steel and Poison type Pokemon and both spike types don't affect Flying type Pokemon, but stack with Toxic Spikes and Spikes respectively.
description: "Stop right there, criminal scum!" Don throws out a set of spikes and stones to make everyone on the opposing side regret their life choices.
